participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, with a love for adventure and family time.
participant_1.background: I enjoy the flexibility of my work schedule so I can spend time with my family and dog. I help people find the perfect outfit, then I head out with my dog Allie to paddle board. I'm a kindergarten teacher. I am the middle child of 3 siblings. I own an iPhone.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and a bit introspective, loves nature and exploring new activities.
participant_2.background: I once saw a whale while on a boat trip with my family. I'm always hungry. I get sad a lot. I love rock climbing. My favorite fruit is apple.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Pretty good, I got to go rock climbing today!
Nice! I love rock climbing. I do it a lot with my dog Allie.
Oh, that's cool! I haven't been in a while. I've been pretty busy with work.
What do you do for work?
Oh, that's awesome! I'm a kindergarten teacher too!
Really? That's so cool! We should meet up sometime!
Yeah, that would be fun! I'm free on Saturday.
Great! I'll bring my dog Allie.
